name: Account Change Audit
description: Account Audit events report when specific user account management tasks are performed, such as a user account is created, changed, deleted, renamed, disabled, enabled, locked out or unlocked.

actor_process.description: The process that requested the account changes.

3.name: Password Change
3.description: An attempt was made to change an account's password.

4.name: Password Reset
4.description: An attempt was made to reset an account's password.

8.name: Locked Out
8.description: A user account was locked out.
